item.title: Authorities say they will release person of interest detained in Brown University shooting
item.description: Officials in Providence say they will release a person of interest detained in a Brown University shooting that killed two students and injured nine

item.title: Trial set to begin for Wisconsin judge accused of helping immigrant evade federal authorities
item.description: The trial of a Wisconsin judge accused of helping an immigrant evade federal authorities this spring is set to begin

item.title: Man suspected of killing his wife in California is extradited back to the US from Peru
item.description: Los Angeles officials say a man suspected of killing his wife and dumping her body in a Southern California forest has been extradited back to the U.S...
